meanings.definition: A person who writes glosses or explanatory notes.
meanings.sent1: The young glossographer carefully explained the difficult words in the book.
meanings.sent2: The glossographer included helpful notes in the margins of the text.
meanings.sent3: The playful glossographer added funny comments to the side of the page.
meanings.sent4: She was a glossographer, painting the pages with her explanations like an artist.
meanings.sent5: The diligent glossographer made the text easier to understand with her notes.

meanings.definition: One who compiles glossaries or dictionaries.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated glossographer spent hours organizing the words into a glossary.
meanings.sent2: The glossographer's dictionary contained definitions for every term.
meanings.sent3: The creative glossographer invented new words for the glossary.
meanings.sent4: He was a glossographer, weaving together words like threads in a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious glossographer aimed to compile the most comprehensive dictionary.
